price: 18.Maalinka marka Buunka la afuufi, oo aad iman idinkoo ummado kala duwan ah;
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
